main.bio: I'm a Web Developer who is very comfortable working in WordPress, and have an ever curious mind when it comes to crafting code. While I try to resolve errors with as little personal time sacrificed as possible, I know when itâ€™s time to be aggressive, which critical issues need overnight solutions, and which ones need to settle.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

work.title: Audio Visual Technician
work.description: Originaly I was hired for Crestview United Methodist in 2010 until they became a legacy Church for Violet Crown in 2019. The team at Violet Crown saw my work and extended an offer to have me on their team and I was delighted to accept. My primary duties are to create and run Pro Presenter presentations for the Sunday services. However I keep myself available for Funerals, Weddings and other organizations that rent out the facility.

testimonials.text: Tommy was absolutely amazing to work with. He quickly was able to jump into the overhauling of the WordPress Site. He asked all the necessary questions to make sure he understood what we needed and wanted the website to look and act like. He was very creative in bring ideas to the table. When things needed tweaking, he was quick to do. Tommy was never afraid to ask questions or for guidance when he didn't know the answer. He always made sure to keep me informed about any situation that we had uncovered. He consistently made sure that I was informed about the outcomes or if I need to follow up. I truly enjoyed working with Tommy. I would not hesitate to reach out to him again for this type of work.
